strapiPost.title: Dance Studio In Rogers To Host Grand Opening Celebration
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Arthur Murray Dance Studio
strapiPost.content:
There’s a new dance studio in Rogers and the owners invite you to the grand opening celebration! 

  • Dance party: Arthur Murray Dance Studio is designed to resemble a 1920s ballroom lounge complete with a baby grand piano. The celebration on June 11 will have food, music, and promises lots of fun on the dance floor — even if you have two left feet and no rhythm. 
  • Learn to dance: If you sign up for the Grand Opening Special before June 11, you will receive one free Personal Dance Lesson; no dance partner or experience is required. Start your dance journey connected and join the DanceNWA Facebook Group too! 

Click HERE to learn more about the grand opening.
